Hand of Noxus {{champion:14}} and Snow Day {{champion:14}}, where we see a living Sion and a metaphorical/literal snow plow Sion.

Chosen of the Spoon {{champion:131}} where she has a huge spoon and is a cook in training.

Haunted {{champion:266}} where he's a stone statue tomb angel kinda thing that's been taken over by plants and now walks among the living.

Oktoberfest {{champion:37}} because I wanna see how they do Sona with an Accordion.

Winterborn {{champion:432}} which I picture as a sort of Freljordian interpretation of Bard, where he's like an iceborn, wields a traditional Freljordian horn and has little ice meeps. Also Mr. Saxo{{champion:432}}, because that song made me think Bard's look awesome in a tux, with a sax.

Geomancer, Fire keeper, (insert sport here) master, Storm Crafter, Cosmic {{champion:134}}, I could go on. Just replace what her orbs are made of and you're good for a Syndra skin.

Dragonslayer {{champion:121}} and {{champion:107}}, where Kha'Zix evolved to be a super dragon bug thing, and Rengar had dragon armour. I recon he'd definetly be kicking in that AU, I mean come on, is Rengar gonna miss a chance to hunt _dragons_?

Some skins for when {{champion:120}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:83}} were still alive would be nice too, even though some might be a tad more difficult than others.
